title: v4.01.02 - Meeting Revamp Based on Community Feedback
contents: Hello everyone,Over the past few days, we've seen extensive discussion about the latest meeting revamp. Your thoughtful feedback, passionate discussions, and creative suggestions haven't gone unnoticed. At Gaggle Studios, community input has always been the cornerstone of our development philosophy.Immediate ChangesWe're thrilled to announce that we've already implemented several changes based directly on your feedback:Reverted Player Position: Players now stand within their player banner, similar to how they were before the revamp.Corpse Found: Reduced the amount of caution tape placed on reported corpses. Corresponding with the Reporter's Megaphone.Default Player Banners: Players without banners are assigned a blank banner based on the theme of the map rather than based off the players colour."Hide Vote Banners" Setting: Shows all players with default player banners.X Marks the Spot (less): X indicating dead players has been darkened and made smaller.No more ghosts: Reverted back to dead players being greyed out with a red X. This is to preserve outfits to help identify someone you may have encountered during the round.Voted... Check!: Repositioned and enhanced the checkmark indicating player has voted over the player banner for quickly identifying who voted and who hasn't.Bug Fixes and Optimizations:Fixed: Issues surrounding Jungle Temple and the calling of meetings.Fixed: Spy misidentifying Mimic as a Duck. If the Spy uses their ability on the Mimic, the Mimic will be identified as a Mimic in the next meeting to the Spy.Fixed: Serial Killer target arrow. Serial Killer's target arrow no longer disappear during a (Pelican/Falcon) hunt.Why This MattersGoose Goose Duck is built off the community that has helped shape it to what it is today. Our goal is to make Goose Goose Duck enjoyable for experienced players while also being inviting to newer players. Your feedback helps us strike that perfect balance, and we're committed to continuing this iterative process together.Thank You!Your passion for our game drives us to constantly improve. This community continues to amaze us with its creativity, thoughtfulness, and dedication. We're listening, we're implementing, and we're excited for what comes next.Keep the feedback coming!‚Äî The Gaggle Studios Team Join our Discord to engage with the community and to continue the conversation!

title: v4.01 - Meeting Revamp
contents: "We Need to Talk!", "Avian Corpse Reported!"Whether you're reporting a corpse or just calling a meeting because you've missed seeing everyone's beak, meetings play a vital role in discovering who's good, who's bad, and who just wants to be voted out! Over the lifetime of Goose Goose Duck, more and more information has been added to the meeting screen, such as:Assassin: Taking out another avian (or themselves) during the meeting.Clown: Making players POP during the meeting.Party/Clown, Silencer, Fortune Teller: Displaying their mark(s) in the meeting.Various ability trackers such as the Lobbyist vote counter.To help track all this information, the meeting screen has been completely revamped to not only display all existing information in a more readable fashion but also prepare for any new features we may add in the future! Meeting Screens RevampChat ToggleTired of repeatedly opening and closing the text conversation? NO MORE! Now the chat button acts as a toggle between two different meeting layouts:Full View: Shows the complete meeting interface with player information.Chat View: Expands the chat window for those intense discussions.Full View:Chat View:*Note: In a 16 Player lobby, the chat window is shortened and you are placed above (layout shift to accommodate).Additional Notes:New Player Found Indicator: Removed the generic "Found" text and made it visually obvious which corpse is being reported.At-a-glance Information: Updated megaphone icon to identify who called the meeting.Added clear icons indicating marked targets and effects (party, silenced, etc.).Dead players appear as ghosts.Reported corpse appears as a corpse in meeting.Any corpses that are created during the meeting also appear as corpses.In-Meeting Animations:Intro crime scene tape indicating which corpse is being reported.Players that meet their end during the meeting are shown the body drop animation, continuing the meeting as a corpse on the meeting screen.Assassin Shot.Clown "POP".ThemingUpdated Themed Appearance: When loading into a map, the loading screens, lobby chats, and meeting screens reflect the map's theme including the splash art for each map.Visual Consistency: Enjoy a more cohesive visual experience throughout the game.Upgraded Navigation SystemBefore: Navigation arrow pointed towards the task in a straight path (as the crow flies).After: Navigation arrow provides guidance towards the selected task through the optimal path.Revamped Game Info PanelEnhanced Room and Game Info: Game info panel now displays comprehensive room and game information.Complete Role Information: Roles section now allows you to read about all possible roles in a match.Quick Reference: Access information when you need it most. This includes copying the room code in-game!Bug Fixes and OptimizationsFixed - Godzilla Map: Adjusted controller support for the clear rubble task.Fixed - Map Changing: Resolved an issue that would cause players to be locked in the collections when changing maps.Fixed - Trick or Treat: Trick or treat properly ends at 0 seconds. Meetings would interfere with the countdown, causing it to continue running past 0 seconds.Various Bug Fixes and Optimizations.Experience a bug or unintended feature? Please let us know by providing as much detail as possible including: Description of what happened.Steps that may have led to the unintended behavior.Ways to let us know! In-game Bug Report: Open Settings -> Bug Reports and fill out the information there.Contact the support team through email at support@gaggle.fun or submit a report through the Online Form.As always, be sure to join our Discord community and share feedback and connect with other players!

title: Update 4.0 - Code Rework + New Tutorial
contents: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/52a7572e1b25e11be64d4056129bd1e911f0b943.png Buckle up for Update 4.0! Version number updates usually mean big changes incoming! There is a lot to note for this one. Goose Goose Duck is turning 4 this year! Over the years, the team has been adding A LOT of content: 12 maps, 10 gamemodes, over 70 roles, and of course a TON of cosmetics to collect! Not only is that a lot of content but a lot of behind-the-scenes work as well, so it's good to go back once in a while and tidy things up a little to be able to keep adding content with as few hiccups as possible. In addition to the code rework, let's discuss some of the notable additions. DISCLAIMER: With major code reworks, bugs and unintended features may turn up despite the amount of rigorous testing the amazing beta testers perform. If you experience a bug or unintended feature, please report them using the in-game bug report section found in Settings or fill out an online ticket form. TutorialThe tutorial section has been updated! We've improved the appearance as well as updated the Goose and Duck Tutorials to help explain how to play. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/e8fa617c41d02e896e13fd61c98ceea958d33637.png In-Game HUD Updated the In-Game HUD visually; combining the role indicator with the duties list. The role indicator now acts as a button to quickly open information regarding your current role. With that additional space at the top of the screen, what should we do with it? In-Game Notifications For too long have notifications of all kinds had been placed in the same location, sometimes covering each other up. Now the Celebrity Death, Flight Points collected, Intercom Usage, Medium Ability, and Goose Hunt Death alerts appear at the top of the screen so that they don't interfere with each other and you can be well informed. Audio Input: Push to Mute Similar to Push to Talk, Push to Mute is simply that - push to mute. An alternative to having to toggle the Mute key. It mutes your mic on press and unmutes on release. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/fe062f9cdf3293ae343c6e60979e785198d066f5.png Pet of the Week Icon The community talked, we listened. Now within the collections pet tab, we've added a calendar icon to indicate which pet is Pet of the Week. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/ba7bd1b11720657f1add480f7fd77bcf87c5c7f3.png Bug Reports and Fixes General Tickets Consistent Terminology: Updated "No Microphone" in Quickplay filters to "Voice Chat".Role Tickets Invisibility Duck Fixed: Vulnerable to being killed/swallowed while invisible. Fixed: Can't see corpses while invisible. Looter Duck Fixed: Disposing corpses in sinkholes reduces kill cooldown. Mime Duck Fixed: Ability movement with mouse is now easier to control. Fixed: Movement is based off controlled player and not the Mime. Ninja Duck Fixed: Kill cooldown continues to go down during meetings. Sniper Duck Adjustment: Disabled on Nexus Colony. Adjustment: Disabled on Ancient Sands. Clown Duck Fixed: Can't access vents. Fixed: If target is cleansed in rejuvenation pod on Eagleton Springs, this is reflected to the Clown during meeting. Party Duck Fixed: If target is cleansed in rejuvenation pod on Eagleton Springs, this is reflected to the Party during meeting. Hitman/Bodyguard Fixed: Target revealed on opening splash screen. Fixed: Dueling Dodos can't be VIP target. Lovers Adjustment: When assassinated in a meeting, shots are delayed rather than simultaneous. Astral Goose Fixed: No longer able to interact with objects (tasks, rollercoaster, etc.) while in astral form. Avenger Goose Fixed: Ability no longer activates through forbidden passageways. Canadian Goose Fixed: If corpse is consumed before auto-report triggers, no meeting is called. Gravy Goose Fixed: Gravy Reward is rewarded at end of match. Fixed: If Sheriff attacks Gravy, and Gravy deflects to a duck/neutral, Sheriff does not die. Mortician Goose Fixed: Returned to available roles. Stalker Goose Fixed: If target is swallowed by Pelican and is later released, arrow returns to original target. Dueling Dodo Fixed: If other Dodo dies before unlocking the kill cooldown, when tasks are completed, the countdown will continue and disappear on zero. Vulture Fixed: Vulture is able to eat feet/corpses created by Demolitionist. Map Tickets Ancient Sands Fixed: Cursed Bell Sabotage resets properly. Bloodhaven Fixed: Cursed Bell Sabotage resets properly. Black Swan Removed: Communication Sabotage. Carnival Added: Mimic added to available roles. Fixed: Rabbit wins with the Ducks if it survives the Rabbit Sabotage. Godzilla Added: Mimic added to available roles. Nexus Colony Removed: Communication Sabotage. Fixed: Loading Dock can be lethal. That's going to do it for this update note. Remember, if you come across any bugs or unintended features, please report them using the in-game bug report feature in Settings or fill out the online ticket form.

title: v3.04 Hoot & Seek!
contents: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/983895b955728b9afbd77fd358927d1a5534f1ea.png Introducing Hoot & Seek Round up your flock of friends (2-5 players) and embark into a game of Hoot and Seek! As the Owl, you'll be able to blend in seamlessly with the crowd. But beware, those pesky Snipers and Spotters are on a mission to expose your feathery whereabouts! Game Mode Description The Owl must blend in with NPCs to complete tasks to win the game. Spotters and Snipers work together to identify and kill the Owl to win. Roles Sniper Snipers are the only ones that can shoot the Owl, and rely on information from the Spotters to find their target. Abilities Targeting: Enter targeting mode. Temporarily stop moving and control the crosshair to search for the Owl. Exit targeting mode. Shoot: Snipers can shoot to kill the Owl. Make sure not to shoot randomly, as any incorrect kill will reward tasks to the Owl and reveal the Sniper's location on the map. Spotter Spotters help the Snipers to locate the Owl, but be aware that the Owl can also hear all communication. Abilities Scan: Scan an area for the Owl's presence. A green circle will show if the Owl is in proximity, and a red circle if they are not. Owl The Owl is visually indistinguishable from the NPCs in the game. They win by stealthily completing tasks and avoiding detection from the Snipers and Spotters. Abilities Disguise: Select a target to disguise as. Can disguise itself by first selecting another player's appearance. Transform: Transform into your selected target. Pickpocket: The Owl can pickpocket Snipers to complete several tasks at once and to reduce the cooldown of their abilities. Blackout: Temporarily reduce the vision of all other players and move faster. Super Reset: Randomize the cosmetics and positions of all players. It has a very high cooldown, so make sure to only use it in case of emergency. Role Updates Demolitionist (Duck): Bomb is now passed automatically by proximity, no longer passed by action button. Party (Duck): Partied players now display an icon next to their name during game play. Only revealed to the Party (Duck). Silencer (Duck): Silenced players now display an icon next to their name during game play. Only revealed to the Silencer (Duck). Pigeon (Neutral): Infected geese now show an infected icon next to their names, to help keep track of the infected. Only revealed to the Pigeon. Astral (Goose): Now togglable into Astral form, and has infinite time. Quickplay Hoot & Seek has been added to Quickplay. Select game mode tabs have been merged. Voice Chat With the last voice chat update we aimed to improve voice chat for everyone, although the quality was better, it led to less accessibility. We've been looking at ways to mitigate this problem and have implemented changes that should solve the problem for most users. We are still working actively and diligently alongside our third-party providers to find a solution. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience as we work through this with these updates. Bug Fixes Role Tutorial now has Drone (Duck) Shaders have been substituted and optimized for Mobile devices. Ancient Sands: Mummy pathing improved. Ancient Sands: Sabotage music has been fixed to no longer play through meetings and ends after meeting. Tastes Like Chicken: Identity thief is now correctly changing feather color upon downing players. Engineer (Goose): When Engineer is killed in a hiding spot, the ghosts no longer appear on map. Improvement to button navigation on controllers. title: August 2023 Devlog Update Recap
contents: In The Works: Eagleton Springs We're excited to being close to release our 10th Map: Eagleton Springs! During the devlog we showed a little of the layout as well as discuss mechanics of the map including: Sewers Arcade Minigames Deadly Traffic New Duck Role: Drone Sabotages Phone System Rejuvenation Pod {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/3faf87a7a2fe627f5be092cddae90db8117d7a49.png Sewers {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/46a80f37a16c913b8ed8aa622c15b15eddb0025e.png Traverse through the sewers of Eagleton Springs if you dare. Be careful, you may find yourself crossing paths with some dangerous birds! Arcade Minigames Enjoy your favourite classic arcade games such as 'Mad Quacks', 'Pelican Pond', 'Invasion of the Mutant Ducks', 'Rotten Egg Jump' and more inside the arcade! Deadly Traffic Make sure you look both ways before crossing the street as traffic can be deadly. If you are not careful you may find yourself smeared across the pavement. Drone Role: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/97ae57c56488b65cd1ea5e45ee1439242b0e2cec.png You can transform to hide your identity. Sabotages: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/86e6523923c6f7fbc9a425af2339eb15d097f58c.png Unlock sabotage using the "Honk IT", sabotages in Eagleton Springs work slightly differently than other maps. By activating a sabotage, Doors - intermittently closes random doors Rejuvenation Pod - Disables the Rejuvenation pod (described below) Lights - Intermittently turns off indoor lights Infection - Infests an area Phones - Disable to the telephones (described below) School Bus - Intermittently call a deadly school bus Phones {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/189c4f6acaed1399a281be06d35f35ba7d8d9c0b.png Throughout Eagleton Springs, you can pick up phones and chat with other birds that are also on the line. Rejuvenation Pod: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/bfb22fcb86d46fd2456e106419f3f0041debc983.png The Rejuvenation Pod is a new mechanic within Goose Goose Duck, the rejuvenation pod can wear off the effects caused by some of the other roles. With more plans in the future, the example on launch is if you find yourself the victim of an Esper Duck or suspect you are, you can remove the effects by entering the pod. Not only will you be cleared of the Espers ability, the Esper will also be eliminated! New Achievements {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/9cd73675b5fc50abc686f4783e5c016ab0848e46.png With new content, come new achievements! However, these ones won't be so easy... Eagleton Springs Claw Machine Event {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/f5c6ae2d41f3a9d9d1461d2fa3b51a3158fb49ce.png Alongside Eagleton Springs, a new limited time Claw Machine Event will take place where players can earn limited time tokens and unlock cool cosmetics in the limited time claw machine! Eagleton Springs Cosmetic Packs {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/76fd8e28164af384376a87b3185fb9405da3103e.png We'll also be releasing new cosmetic pack sets with Eagleton springs! In the works: UI Update Part 2 {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/c648a95f1e37aee2d9ecc72656333a81aaa1e18c.png We're continuing to update the UI, bringing in new features and a cleaner look! Hair/Eye Separation {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/6263d8aa401ed2e864307e3e4525f85555b7ace9.gif Long anticipated eye/hair separation! Soon players will be able to mix and match outfits and the eyes! Outfit Presets {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/cf3b236c72234647ed3e8f7865704b62be2b3881.png Save your various outfits into presets for those quick outfit changes. Outfit Filtering {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/43e8a154ce1c93102dda973ed17e7a6c59ab9aa5.png Search through your unlocked cosmetics easily with the new filtering and search features! In the works: Classic/Draft Updates {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/c2a194bd92c89278ad3cbed590261be97159f849.png Pelican is going to be added to all Maps! What about the Falcon? Falcon is going to be added to all maps! How does that work? If a falcon is selected, there can be no Pelican. If a pelican is selected, there can be no Falcon nor Vulture! If a vulture is selected, there can be no Pelican. Can we please add Lovers to Draft? Fine, Lovers and Hitman/Bodyguard can be added to draft. How does that work? Only one set of paired roles can be selected (if there are lovers, no hitman/bodyguard and vice versa) Once the first lover/hitman/bodyguard is selected, they will appear as ? in the draft. Later in the draft players will be presented to be the other half of the pair. If no one selects the other half, it is forced upon the last player in the draft. title: Goose Goose Duck Devlog Recap - June 2023
contents: On Friday June 9 live on Twitch, Chris and Dom walked the community through the May Updates and brought the latest updates including new roles, new game modes, new updates, and revealed the next map. Let's take a look what was discussed! Coming Soon New Role: Sin Eater Duck {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/5330c5abdc05088ab9b2d4f1b9690ba30d79ccfa.png Coming soon to corruption game mode, the Sin Eater Duck collects corruption to gain the ability to detonate, killing an area of players at the cost their life. New Game Mode: Tastes Like Chicken {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/1b2bc46bab076e8644883e8ae68bc201922d7585.png Taste Like Chicken is a Social Deduction Battle Royale coming soon to Goose Goose Duck. Protect your team's chicken and kill everyone else. This month we also talked about adding a mechanic to enclose the play area, forcing teams to go head-to-head. Note: Taste Like Chicken will be available on all maps EXCLUDING Nexus Colony. Why not Nexus Colony? Each player is a Goose with fast movement, no meetings. Just tasks. Token caps still apply. UI Update Update We discuss that we have many plans to update the UI to improve the game flow and appearance for creating and joining lobbies. title: v2.24 Update
contents: v2.24 Update {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/2ea9da4ed57fcbce7efa785ac3026793a7eed7de.png New Seamstress Role {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/3680d278c94a8b209fb56850f3d2dab5c5a36c91.png You can compare corruption once per round. New Game Mode: Corruption {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/6bd74d483a5feead3cc03ba921690042de57eab9.png An advanced variant of the Classic game mode recommended only for experienced players. This introduces the corruption mechanic as well as several new roles. This means the Corruption mechanic (and the roles associated with it) have been removed from Bloodhaven in Classic game mode and has been added to its own game mode: Corruption! This gives players the option to enjoy Bloodhaven with or without the corruption mechanic. This also opens up the potential to add the Corruption game mode to other existing maps as well as new maps in the future while still being able to provide the Classic game mode experience to players. Bloodhaven Classic: Notes: Removed High Priest, Initiate, Inquisitor, Demon Hunter, Saint, Crow Roles Day/Night Cycle - Players are no longer viewed as Demons at night, but the town will still transform. Sabotages The Basic Demon - Summons a Demon that chases and freezes a player if they make contact. Cursed Vision - All players will change form into a randomized Demon form, names are removed from everyone but are still visible for ducks. Cursed Bell - Spawns a bell randomly on the map. If it is not picked up in time, a special meeting will be called where a random non-duck non-dodo will be ejected if no one is voted out. Emergency meetings cannot be called, but bodies can be reported. Poison Water - Emergency meetings cannot be called, but bodies can be reported. Results in duck victory if not resolved in time. Bloodhaven Corruption: Notes: Includes High Priest, Initiate, Inquisitor, Demon Hunter, Saint, Seamstress, Crow Roles Sabotages Basic Demon - Summons a Demon at night and freezes and corrupts a player on contact. Invisible Demon - Summons a Demon and freezes and corrupts a player on contact, can only be seen by target. Helper Demon - Summons a Demon that will target a duck and give them corruption. Corruption Scan - Scans the map to see the live location of corrupted players Bug Fixes Various bug fixes and optimizations.

title: Goose Goose Duck Devlog Recap - May 2023
contents: Second Friday of each month means its time for an update about what Gaggle Studios has been up to and what you can look forward to in the near future! Last Friday, May 12 Chris and Dom covered this news! Be sure to tune in LIVE for exclusive Twitch Drops as well as Q&A and Giveaways! New Roles Coming Soon {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/61f0200b399ff41491150bfd5c80b080857ee3eb.png Three new roles will be coming soon to GGD including: Preacher Duck - You can target Non-Ducks to increase their voting power. Seamstress Goose - You can compare corruption once per round. Sin Eater Duck - Collect corruption to gain the ability to kill in an area at the cost of your life. If you kill enough players you will survive. New Game Mode: Corruption Coming Soon {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/7426d2bbcf430cbabefdfb25819f54622f209d40.png Corruption will soon become its own game mode. Players that enjoy the corruption mechanic and roles will still be able to play with corruption while allowing players that prefer to play classic or draft will soon have the option to do so! By separating corruption into a new game mode, this will also allow corruption to be implemented into other maps without removing the classic/draft experience. Pelican News Coming Soon {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/3b5c1da82f44f475cda66102ee89ef15dd4a7d9b.png Pelican will be travelling to new maps including: Mallard Manor Jungle Temple What will happen when the boulder runs over the Pelican? what will happen when the Pelican gets hit with the chandelier? You'll have to wait to find out! New Game Mode: Tastes Like Chicken Coming Soon {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/b02ba80ed7e4f96be22031311928cb5287c99081.png Tastes Like Chicken is going to be a team-based mini-battle royale for 8-16 players where the objective is to eliminate other teams. Players will have three states: Living - Able to fight against other teams and utilize abilities Downed - In a vulnerable state to be eliminated by Chickens or timer. Can only be revived by Chicken. Dead - Cannot be revived, has been eliminated {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/006517fe897fd127e1cc0770f88c520430488393.png {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/85f3fce64d03b33a0c47e74ea3b2e4b57153cb14.png The new Chicken role will be responsible for reviving downed teammates as well as finishing downed enemies. Bug Report Feature Coming Soon {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/dcbb64fbd56daa2c7587a0ac64b0fdfb0452c8f3.png Soon players will be able to make reports directly in game, serving as an alternative to emailing support@gaggle.fun or submitting a bug report in the community discord. Outplayed Compatibility Coming Soon {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40318739/14abbf0a4b20346afab2bd480e0fb33a77dac840.png Capture. Review. Share. Simple. Soon you will be able to easily capture your favourite GGD moments to share with friends with Overwolf's Outplayed Application for PC including. Manually record sessions, full sessions, full matches, or record just the highlights such as: Victories Kills Deaths Meetings Easily capture and share with the use of Outplayed features! When will all these features be available? As soon as its Ready!
